name: Pumpkin Spice (Jorddagreatest)
description:
Description

Pumpkin Spice is a cozy barista simulator for pumpkins... so if you aren't a pumpkin then you can leave!

Pumpkin spice is open ended, so you can play for as long as you like. You will earn new ingredients on the start of every new day up until the fourth day.  On the fifth day you will no longer unlock new ingredients, but the pumpkins will still be thirsty for more coffee!

You will be tasked with mixing ingredients to create coffee with a blend of flavors that fit the preferences of each pumpkin who comes to your shop. You will then need to use careful timing to pour the drink, a perfectly filled drink will net you bonus points, but customers hate having coffee spilled on their cup.

Some Tips
  • Right clicking on an ingredient will open the shop for that ingredient
  • Hovering over an ingredient will show you the effect that it will have on the current ingredient if you use it.
  • Some ingredients will reduce flavors in the current order, but no flavor in the order can ever be less than 0.
Credits

Game Design - Jorddagreatest

Art - Jorddagreatest

Programming - Jorddagreatest

Music - "Whalley Hollies" by FREE MUSIC MAISON (Looped by Jorddagreatest)

Sound Effects - Interface and Item Sounds by Cafofo (With minor adjustments by Jorddagreatest)

Font - Rodin Pro UB

Tools Used - Unity, Procreate, Inkscape, and Audacity
